old:
私はアッカー王家に仕えてきた
ダーマードという――
貴殿をこの先へ導こう
column2:
I have served the Acre royal family.
My name is Damad.
I will guide you from now on.

old:
ほこらの中にただよう力を
私の元まで集めてきてくれないか
さすれば、ここを埋める土砂を一掃してみせよう
column2: Gather the power that lies within the dust and come to me, and I will sweep away the sediment that fills this place!

old:
――よくやってくれた
これだけの力が戻れば
この道を拓く程度のことはできるだろう
column2: You did well. If only this much strength can return, we should be able to clear this path.

old:
土砂を一掃し、二度とこの道が
埋まらぬよう力を尽くそう
かつて王の剣であったこの魂にかけても
column2: Let's clear away the debris and do our best to ensure this path won't be blocked again. I swear it on the soul of the sword that once belonged to the king.

old:
先へ進むといい、白き竜の覚者よ
アッカーシェランにかかる霧を払ってくれ
column2: Go ahead, White Dragon's Arisen, and dispel the fog that hangs over Acre Selund.

old:
道を通すまでの間
しばし待つことだ、白き竜の覚者よ
column2: Until the road is cleared, it is necessary to wait for a while, O Arisen of the White Dragon.

old:
この道は必ず拓いてみせる
かつて王の剣であったこの魂にかけても
column2:
I will definitely open up this path.
I swear on the soul that once belonged to the king's sword.

old:
貴殿が力を求め、《英霊眠りし道》を
訪れたこと――我らにとって僥倖であった
column2: Your visit to the Heroic Spirit Sleeping Path, in search of power, was fortunate for us.

old:
ご存命の王族は
ネド王子ただお一人、か――
column2: The only surviving member of the royal family is Prince Nedo.

old:
この道をさらに進むことで
貴殿は力を得よう
私にできるのは、その道を拓くことのみ
column2: By advancing further down this path, you will gain power. All I can do is pave the way for you.

old: 貴殿の仲間はすでに道を拓いている
column2: Your comrades have already opened up the path.

old:
仲間の力をたどり、一時的に
この場を通ることも可能だろう
――貴殿の考えを聞こう
column2:
It would be possible to trace the power of our friends and temporarily pass through this place.
--Let's hear your thoughts!
Follow the power of your companion
